job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Growing 5G company in Milpitas, CA is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join the team!
This Jobot Job is hosted by Taylor Buckelew
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $135,000 - $180,000 per year
A Bit About Us
Located in the beautiful Milpitas, CA we are the first 5G wireless company that is eliminating hardware and providing true NLOS performance . We are looking to hire a sharp Site Reliability Engineer to join or small but growing team!
As part of the Software Engineering team, you will help us manage software that runs on the cloud and remotely manages millions of radio devices. You will work on a team responsible for all aspects of cloud operations.
Why join us?
We offer a comprehensive compensation package including but not limited to
A competitive base salary ranging from $135K-$180K + EQUITY!
Full Benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)
401K + match!
Generous Paid Time Off/Holiday/Sick time
Mentorship / Growth Opportunities
Friendly/collaborative team
Job Details
You will be responsible for
Cloud operations including CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code, Monitoring and alerting, Automation for scaling, failure recovery, disaster recovery, Non-disruptive upgrades, rollbacks, etc.
Managing development, testing, staging, and AWS environments
Setting up and managing Kubernetes and Istio-based clusters for deploying applications
Setting up and managing other services needed by the application (e.g. AWS Kafka, ElasticSearch, Redis, RDS databases, etc.)
Implementing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines
Automating the monitoring and auto-scaling of the production environment, to support millions of connected devices
MUST HAVE, strong experience with
Linux administration
AWS
Implementing CI/CD pipelines
NICE TO HAVE, knowledge of some or most of the skills below
CI/CD using GitLab
Terraform
Ansible
Kubernetes
Istio service mesh
Microservice architecture
Helm charts for deployment
Exposure in deploying and managing various other technologies, like
EFK Stack
Databases like PostgreSQL and MySQL
Apache Kafka clusters
Redis caches
Monitoring and Alerting using Prometheus & Grafana
IF INTERESTED, APPLY DIRECTLY HERE OR EMAIL ME A RESUME AT taylor.buckelew@jobot.com
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
